messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Sasano Akasaka book
messages.msgSnippet: Just what I wanted to know.  Thank you. ... From: Jim Gilbert To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent: Monday, July 21, 2003 9:47 AM Subject: Re: [nihontostudy]
messages.messageBody:
Just what I wanted to know. Thank you.
----- Original Message -----
From: Jim Gilbert
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, July 21, 2003 9:47 AM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Sasano Akasaka book


Mr. Sasano published a small book on Akasaka tsuba in 1966. I don't think that there's any connection with the Sano museum Akasaka catalog.

Jim



I came upon a reference to a book by Sasano Masayuki on Akasaka Tsubas.
Would that be the 1990 Sano Museum publication?



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
